title: Takbir Tasbih During Travel
description: Authentic supplications for Takbir Tasbih During Travel
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Takbir Tasbih During Travel. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 214
items.arabic: قَالَ جَابِرٌ رضي الله عنه: ((كُنَّا إِذَا صَعَدْنَا كَبَّرْنَا، وَإِذَا نَزَلْنَا سَبَّحْنَا)).
